means: 使明显（evidence的过去式与过去分词形式）

sentence.Network_en: She was not calculating and evidenced no specific interest in money.
sentence.Network_cn: 她没什么心计，而且能感觉出她对钱没什么兴趣。

sentence.Network_en: He's wise in other ways too, as evidenced by his reason for switching from tennis to golf.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在其他方面同样明智，这一点可以从他不打网球改打高尔夫的理由中得到证明。

sentence.Network_en: This power of the mind was clearly evidenced in mathematics.
sentence.Network_cn: 思维的这种力量,在数学中明白地得到证实.

PerfectNetExp.abs: a contract of sale need not be concluded in or evidenced by writing and is not to any other requirement as to form .销售合同无须以书面订立或书面证明，在形式方面也不受任何其它条件的限制。
This power of the mind was clearly evidenced in mathematics ., 思维的这种力量 , 在数学中明白地得到证实.
This is evidenced by the discovery of figures of women ., 这是由女性图形的发现作证据的.

list.abs: his answer evidenced a guilty conscience ., 他的回答证明他良心有愧.

the company focuses solely on core business areas , as evidenced by its business units , namely Command and Control Devices , Motor Starters and Drives , Circuit Breakers and building automation .公司单独地集中于核心业务区域，如见证由它的营业单位，即命令和控制设备、电动机起动器和驱动、开关和大厦自动化。
yes . as evidenced the pain and injuries he carries from one day to the next .有可能。可以作为证据的是他的伤痛会带到下一天。

documents to accompany drafts are listed below and must be presented negotiation with 10 days of date of Bill of Lading or other document evidencing dispatch of goods .随附汇票的单据如下所列，这些单据须在提单日期或其他单据证明货物发运日期之后10天内提交议付。
all evidencing shipment from shanghai port , china to port Rashid dubai-uae by ocean going vessels .所有证明装运从上海港口，中国港口拉希德在迪拜的阿联酋由远洋船只。

entry.def: Evidence is anything that you see, experience, read, or are told that causes you to believe that something is true or has really happened.

example.ex: Ganley said he'd seen no evidence of widespread fraud...
example.tran: 甘利说他没有看见诈骗泛滥的证据。

example.ex: There is a lot of evidence that stress is partly responsible for disease...
example.tran: 有很多证据证明压力是造成疾病的原因之一。

entry.def: Evidence is the information which is used in a court of law to try to prove something. Evidence is obtained from documents, objects, or witnesses.

example.ex: The evidence against him was purely circumstantial.
example.tran: 对他不利的这项证据完全是间接证据。

entry.def: If you give evidence in a court of law or an official enquiry, you officially say what you know about people or events, or describe an occasion at which you were present.

example.ex: The forensic scientists who carried out the original tests will be called to give evidence...
example.tran: 进行最初化验的法医学家将被传唤到庭作证。

example.ex: Cabin crew have been giving evidence at the M1 aircrash enquiry.
example.tran: 机舱人员一直在为M1空难调查作证。

entry.def: If a particular feeling, ability, or attitude is evidenced by something or someone, it is seen or felt.

example.ex: He's wise in other ways too, as evidenced by his reason for switching from tennis to golf...
example.tran: 他在其他方面同样明智，这一点可以从他不打网球改打高尔夫的理由中得到证明。

example.ex: She was not calculating and evidenced no specific interest in money.
example.tran: 她没什么心计，而且能感觉出她对钱没什么兴趣。

entry.def: If someone or something is in evidence, they are present and can be clearly seen.

example.ex: Poverty and bad housing conditions are still very much in evidence.
example.tran: 贫困和糟糕的住房条件仍很常见。

auth_sentence.content: The title is wrong, yes as evidenced from your experience.
auth_sentence.res_content: The title is wrong, yes as evidenced from your experience.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The title is wrong, yes as evidenced from your experience.

auth_sentence.content: Gilbert...had evidenced no recognition whatever of the existence of Anne Shirley.
auth_sentence.res_content: Gilbert...had evidenced no recognition whatever of the existence of Anne Shirley.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Gilbert...had evidenced no recognition whatever of the existence of Anne Shirley.

auth_sentence.content: This is evidenced by the weak math skills across the nation.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is evidenced by the weak math skills across the nation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is evidenced by the weak math skills across the nation.
